entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:38 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:38 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:38 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
